rows.title: Warn on Low Balance
rows.description: Receive a warning when your account balance is below a specified limit

rows.title: Email on Updates
rows.description: Opt to receive email notifications for account updates and new features

rows.title: Change First Name
rows.description: Modify your first name in the account details

rows.title: Change Last Name
rows.description: Modify your last name in the account details

rows.title: Context and Responses
rows.description: Edit context settings and response type

rows.title: Image Generation
rows.description: Enable or disable the generation of images in response to user queries.

rows.title: Online Search
rows.description: Toggle the capability to perform online searches for information.

rows.title: Media Search
rows.description: Allow chatbot to search for media, such as images or documents.

rows.title: Audio Responses
rows.description: Specify whether the chatbot can respond with audio messages.

rows.title: Image Recognition
rows.description: Enable or disable image recognition capabilities for the chatbot.

rows.title: Accept Links
rows.description: Enable or disable the ability to prompt with links.

rows.title: Choose Audio Voice
rows.description: Select the preferred voice for audio responses.

rows.title: Image Settings
rows.description: Customize image generation settings such as quality and size.
